song.title: The Power of Your Love
song.lyrics:
[V1] .G D/F# Em Bm Em Lord, I come to You, let my heart be changed, renewed, .D C D Em D Flowing from the grace, That I found in You || .G D/F# Em Bm Em Lord, I've come to know, The weaknesses I see in me .D C D C/G G Will be stripped away, By the power of Your love
[C] .C Em D C/G G Hold me close, Let Your love surround me .C Em D G Am7 G/B Bring me near, Draw me to Your side || . C Em D C/G G And as I wait, I'll rise up like the eagle . D/F# Em D C And I will soar with You, Your Spirit leads me on . D C/G G In the power of Your Love
[V2] .G D/F# Em Bm Em Lord unveil my eyes, Let me see You face to face .D C D Em D The knowledge of Your love, As You live in me || .G D/F# Em Lord renew my mind . Bm Em As Your will unfolds in my life .D C D C/G G In living every day, In the power of Your Love
